name: Blind Man's Bluff
overview: An Amidar clone, created by Yvan Lavoie and published in 1984 by Advantage*Artworx, where you run around in the gaming area and create rectangles and squares over the entire playing field, once you complete them, it will complete the level. You must do this while avoiding enemies. You can force them to jump to help you if they get in your way up to 3 times per level or life span.
